attributes.action: NO money to be sent to  the Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
I have read that the Chancellor is to offer millions to the  new Ukrainian  government.

In view of the fact that we are already sending money to various Countries that we can ill afford and the damage to our infrastructure this winter is going to cost millions any spare funds should be spent in the UK. on rebuilding and coastal protection  I feel that giving away more money is a betrayal of the British people.

Vote NO to giving away more taxpayers money and spend more in Britain  .
